webscript.shortname: Create quota for a user on Home Folder
webscript.description:
Create quota for a user on Home Folder
To test: curl -v -u admin:admin -X POST -H "Content-type:application/json" -d '{"quota":"{quota}"}' http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/keensoft/myfiles/quota/{username}
The following properties must be set.
quota
amount of bytes allowed in My Files user folder
